snippet: The United States Embassy warned Americans that terrorist groups may be planning “an unspecified attack” during the conference in the capital of Abuja, though President Goodluck Jonathan assured delegates that they would be safe.
abstract: Nigerian security forces raid areas near site of two bombings in capital city of Abuja, and detain eight suspects, including foreigners, as city prepares to host three-day international conference; American embassy warns Americans that terrorist groups may be planning attack.
lead_paragraph: The United States Embassy warned Americans that terrorist groups may be planning “an unspecified attack” during the conference in the capital of Abuja, though President Goodluck Jonathan assured delegates that they would be safe.

headline.main: Nigerian Security Forces Detain 8 in Bombings, as World Economic Forum Nears
headline.print_headline: Nigerian Security Forces Detain 8 in Bombings, As World Economic Forum Nears
